modalInfoPage.desc: All symbols pay from left to right on adjacent reels starting from the leftmost reel.

mainSymbols.text: This is bonus symbol, It appears on all reels. hit 3 or more BONUS symbols to trigger the free spin Feature
This symbol is WILD and substitutes for all symbols.Wild symbol appears on reels 2, 3 and 4. Whenever a wild appears on the screen in the base game it can randomly trigger the JACKPOT BONUS GAME.

freeSpinImages.desc: Mupltiplier Symbols substitutes for all symbols, the value of each multiplier symbol is multiplied to the symbol's value
Money Symbols substitutes for all symbols, the value of each money symbol is added to the symbol's value
